product_description: Transport your travel essentials effortlessly and stylishly. An elegant brushed pattern hides any potential scratches or scuffs from your journeys. The fully-lined interior has cross-straps, a privacy curtain with its own zippered organizational pockets. Tsa approved combination lock for security and peace of mind. Beautiful brush-stroke coloration which is great for hiding any potential scratches or scuffs from your journeys.

name: Flight Knight 24x16x10 Expandable Carry On Suitcase Hardside TSA Lock USB C Lightweight Luggage Silent Double Spinner Wheels Maximum Overhead Carry-On Bag For Virgin South West Approved Navy/Tan
short_description: SIZES: Carry-On 24" Expandable - Overall Dimensions: 24x16x10 Inches (Including Handles & Wheels), Packaging Dimensions: 20.5x14.8x10 Inches, Weight: 5.95 LB, Capacity: 49 Liters. Expands to 24x16x12 Inches Capacity: 58 Liters (Including Handles & Wheels) So whether you're flying for business or jetting off on your next adventure holiday this cabin bag will give you the most flexibility across your travels.

AIRLINE COMPATIBILITY: The cabin size luggage in this set is compatible with over 100 airlines operating in the USA and around the globe. Including overhead carry-on for South west, Virgin and Frontier approved airlines. Tested using the airlines baggage sizer this cabin bag comfortably fits in the overhead locker and will avoid airline charges. The perfect purchase for your next trip by plane, train, vessel, coach or car.

LUGGAGE PROTECTION: Whenever and wherever you travel we know your luggage and contents are precious to you. The unique PC+ABS combination forms the extra thick hard outer shell which has a rugged anti-scratch water resistant surface. The highest quality materials ensure the suitcase is impact-resistant and durable whilst being lightweight. Withstand the rigours of modern transport and airline handling protecting your luggage and its contents during your travels. 3 Years manufacturers warranty.

FEATURES: Adjustable and sturdy aluminium 3-step telescopic handle system offers effortless manoeuvring even in the tightest of spaces. The fully lined interior and the multi-use organizational pockets make packing clothes easy, double stitched to prevent wear and tears. Four double super silent spinner wheels, designed for full 360°manoeuvrability and tested extensively on different surfaces and conditions to ensure endurance and strength, extensively drop tested with a 100% pass rate.

TSA APPROVED INTERGRATED LOCK: The built in TSA approved lock allows you to secure your suitcase and the valuable items that are stored within and also helps hold your bags zippers together, so they don’t accidentally open while in transit. The TSA is the US government agency that is in charge of airport security at all US airports with a TSA-approved luggage lock, the TSA will have a universal key to open the lock to check your bag and then re-lock it to ensure it remains secured.

name: RAINSMORE Carry on Luggage 20 Inch Expandable, Airline Approved Carry on Suitcase with Front Compartment & Top Opening Hard Shell Rolling Travel Luggage with TSA Lock & Spinner Wheels, Black
short_description: FRONT LAPTOP COMPARTMENT FOR BUSINESS: Designed as a premium carry on luggage for professionals. The dedicated front-access compartment keeps your laptop (up to 15.6”) safe and separate from clothing. Unlike traditional suitcases, the innovative Top-Opening design allows you to access devices while standing in crowded airport lines. It provides quick access for efficient security checks, making it ideal for business travel.

AIRLINE APPROVED CARRY ON: This 20 inch carry on luggage meets the size regulations for most domestic and international airlines. Our carry on luggage with wheels is perfect for 3-5 day trips. Features double-ended zippers and TSA-approved locks to ensure hassle-free baggage screening. Dimensions: 21.5x14.2x9.5 inches (including wheels). Weight: 6.77 lbs.

EXPANDABLE CAPACITY UP TO 45L: This suitcase is expandable for extra packing flexibility. Lightweight & durable, it's ideal for quick getaways. Pulling open the zipper expands depth by 1.7 inches, adding an extra 5L of space (Total 45L). Helps you pack more items and keep your travel essentials organized. It combines intelligent design with practical functionality.

DURABLE PC MATERIAL & WATER-RESISTANT: This Hard Shell carry-on luggage is crafted from premium Polycarbonate (PC). Designed for frequent travel, the high-density PC body is impact-resistant and water-resistant, ensuring your laptop and valuables stay dry even on rainy days. Unlike standard plastic suitcases, it flexes under pressure to prevent cracking. The textured shell is extremely scratch-resistant and has passed the shock drop test for long-lasting durability.

SUPERIOR MANEUVERABILITY: The rolling suitcase features smooth 360° silent swivel wheels that are durable on cobblestone or carpet. It has a sturdy, smooth, three-level adjustable aluminium handle. Soft silicone handles on the top and sides make this lightweight suitcase easy to lift into overhead bins.

name: Traveler's Choice Pagosa Indestructible Hardshell Expandable Spinner Luggage, Slate Blue, 22-Inch Carry-on
short_description: Impact Resistant: Indestructible polypropylene hardshell that’s abrasion-, scratch-, and water-resistant. Expansion gusset provide up to 2" to make packing effortless.
Smooth & Silent: Spinner wheels offer 360° rolling maneuverability, allowing you to glide smoothly through crowds and busy airports with ease.

Easy Maneuverability: Navigate with ease using the multi-stage telescopic handle with a push-button lock for adjustable height and smooth control. Top, side, and bottom rubber carry handles ensure effortless lifting and carrying from any angle.
Travel Sentry TSA Combo Lock: Provides enhanced security by safeguarding your belongings while allowing TSA agents to inspect your luggage without causing damage.

Space-Saving Interior: Maximize packing efficiency with a spacious main compartment featuring a zippered middle divider and multiple zippered pockets for organized storage. Durable self-mending #10 zippers ensure long-lasting reliability.
product_description: Travel with confidence and durability with the Traveler's Choice Pagosa Luggage. Crafted with a textured polypropylene hardshell, this set is abrasion-, scratch-, and water-resistant—perfect for withstanding the demands of any journey. The 360° spinner wheels ensure smooth and effortless mobility through crowded terminals, while the multi-stage telescoping handle with a push-button lock allows for easy height adjustment and maneuverability. Conveniently charge while you're on the go with an iTravel charging port (carry-on only, powerbank not included). Each piece includes an expansion gusset that offers up to 2 inches of additional packing capacity. Top and side rubber carry handles make lifting a breeze. Inside, you'll find a spacious main compartment with multiple zippered pockets and interior compression straps to keep belongings neatly secured. Finished with durable self-mending #10 zippers, the Pagosa set is designed to last, trip after trip.
